name: Diableros: Zombie RPG Shooter
description:
Greetings Zombie shooters!
You snored so loud - you woke up the dead! And now it is time to grab your gun, shoot them up and clean up the mess!
Take control over Martin, a simple man, outcast by his fellow humans, just because he snores too loud. He found shelter in a lonely cottage near the graveyard, when catastrophe struck and his shooting adventure begins.
Step up, stack up awesome skills and fight like your life depends on it. Face the never-ending waves of monsters and obstacles in this action-packed shooter.
Enjoy creating countless combinations of unique skills all designed to help you survive. Blast your way through different worlds facing relentless monsters and obstacles.
Key Features:
Level up your weapons and skills with 50+ upgrades to increase your stats.
Gain special abilities to add more damage
Unlock new worlds with new enemies and obstacles
Unlock Talents for permanent advantage
Unlock new weapons, each with unique upgrades and abilities
